      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobConf job)
        Runs before each map. Obtains the path to the model parameters file from the job conf. Then parses the file and fills in the transition and emission log probabilities maps.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobConfigurable
        Overrides:
        configure in class org.apache.hadoop.mapred.MapReduceBase

      • calculateForwardMatrix

        private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double[]> calculateForwardMatrix(java.util.List<java.lang.String> observationSequence,
                                                                        java.util.Map<StringPair,java.lang.Double> transLogProbDict,
                                                                        java.util.Map<StringPair,java.lang.Double> emisLogProbDict,
                                                                        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> stateSet,
                                                                        java.lang.String startState)
        Calculates the forward matrix given an observation sequence and model parameters. Returns a dictionary mapping each state X to an array of log probabilities, where each log probability at index i corresponds to the sum over all possible previous taggings of the probability of observation i given this state X.

      • calculateBackwardMatrix

        private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double[]> calculateBackwardMatrix(java.util.List<java.lang.String> observationSequence,
                                                                         java.util.Map<StringPair,java.lang.Double> transLogProbDict,
                                                                         java.util.Map<StringPair,java.lang.Double> emisLogProbDict,
                                                                         java.util.Set<java.lang.String> stateSet,
                                                                         java.lang.String startState)
        Calculates the backward matrix given an observation sequence and model parameters. Returns a dictionary mapping each state X to an array of log probabilities, where each log probability at index i corresponds to the sum over all possible subsequent taggings given this state X, not including the observation i.

      • calculateLogTransitionCounts

        private static java.util.Map<StringPair,java.lang.Double> calculateLogTransitionCounts(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double[]> forwardMatrix,

                                                                      java.lang.String startState)
        Calculates the transition counts for an observation sequence.

      • getLogAlpha

        private static java.lang.Double getLogAlpha(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double[]> forwardMatrix)
        Returns the log alpha for the observation sequence under the given model, or null if alpha == 0.
